title: An Act relative to maintenance of private roads in the city of Gloucester

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Tarr and Ms. Ferrante of Gloucester, a joint petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 2596) of Bruce E. Tarr and Ann-Margaret Ferrante (with approval of the mayor and city council) for legislation relative to the appropriation and expenditure of funds for the maintenance, repair and improvement of private roads under certain conditions.  Municipalities and Regional Government.  [Local approval received.]

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Municipalities and Regional Government

related_entities.name: committee on Municipalities and Regional Government

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 09/23/2025 from 02:00 PM-02:00 PM in Written Testimony Only
Bill reported favorably by committee and placed in the Orders of the Day for the next session
Read second and ordered to a third reading
Taken out of the Orders of the Day
Read third (title changed) and passed to be engrossed
Read; and referred to the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling
